name: The Bug Squasher
imagePrompt: A stylized, glowing fork tool, with tiny bug icons impaled on its tines, and positive emojis floating around it, set in a Web3 aesthetic.
abilityText: Lifesteal. After your hero attacks, draw a card. 'Bug report filed. Status: Won't Fix. Reason: Feature.'
flavorText: Whether it's a glowing review or a pointed bug report, Kaycee's got an opinion. And screenshots. Always screenshots.

weaponEffect.description: After your hero attacks, draw a card.
